channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18816] CREATE TABLE (ACID) doesn't work with TIMESTAMPLOCALTZ column type
item.description:
Reproducer

set hive.support.concurrency=true;
set hive.txn.manager=org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.lockmgr.DbTxnManager;

CREATE TABLE table_acid(d int, tz timestamp with local time zone)
    clustered by (d) into 2 buckets stored as orc TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');

Error

FAILED: Execution Error, return code 1 from org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.DDLTask. java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Unknown primitive type TIMESTAMPLOCALTZ

Error stack

org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Unknown primitive type TIMESTAMPLOCALTZ

item.summary: CREATE TABLE (ACID) doesn't work with TIMESTAMPLOCALTZ column type

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: vgarg jcamachorodriguez Hi guys. May i take this JIRA? I have patch for it.
ikryvenko, sure, go for it. Thanks

-1 overall
